caller_intent: Inform Alliance Insurance Services about the denial of Shelton Stevens' claim related to a long-term toilet leak, explaining the reason for denial and ensuring alignment between agencies.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed the claim details (policyholder: Shelton Stevens, policy number provided, claim type: toilet leak from wax ring).
Explained denial reason: long-term gradual leakage excluded under policy terms.
Noted that customer was informed of the denial and instructed to contact for updates on inspection/mitigation.
Agreed to document the interaction and relay claim status to relevant parties.
knowledge_required: Understanding of insurance claim denial criteria for gradual water damage
Policy language related to excluded perils
systems_referenced: Carrier's claim status portal (implied through reference to 'denied at this time')
summary: Kelsey from State Co Insurance notified Alliance of Shelton Stevens' denied claim due to long-term toilet leak, explaining the exclusion for gradual damage. She confirmed customer was informed and agreed to document the interaction. The call highlights the need for inter-agency communication on claim denials.
